projects.title: WORK FRIENDLY CAFE - VAN
projects.description: “Next.js” & “WordPress” - JAMstack website using WP GraphQL and REST API. We can find or post cafe information that has outlets and Wi-Fi.

projects.title: FocusTube
projects.description: “Youtube Data API v3” & “Redux” project. On this website, we can control our favourite videos list easily. We also search videos from the search bar on this website.

projects.title: Weather APP with DARK MODE
projects.description: A Weather app web page using “Open weather API”, “Unsplash API” and “TailwindCSS”. It is also adapted to dark mode.

projects.title: My portfolio page
projects.description: This portfolio website. It was used 'React with TypeScript' and 'styled-components' for styling.

projects.title: FIND BLOG POSTS
projects.description: An automatic chat apps page. It can find WordPress blog articles using 'WordPress REST API'

projects.title: Node.js-MongoDB CRUD Blog with comments
projects.description: A blog has a CRUD system.  We can add comments and click the like / dislike button. Using MongoDB for a database. It would be updated with submitting something.

projects.title: LP page
projects.description: LP website using Sass and Vanilla Javascript. I tried using the 'Neumorphism' design because it was a trend.
